intro.title: Welcome to Addition Fun!
intro.narration: Hello, little mathematicians! Today, we're going to have some fun with addition. Are you ready to learn how to add 1 and 2 together? Let's dive in!

explanation.title: Understanding 1 + 2
explanation.narration: When we add numbers, we are putting them together to find out how many we have altogether. So, if we have 1 apple and we add 2 more apples, how many apples do we have now? That's right! 1 plus 2 equals 3. We can think of it as counting: 1, 2, 3! So, 1 + 2 = 3!

practice_mcq.title: Let's Practice!
practice_mcq.question: What is 1 + 2?
practice_mcq.explanation: Great job! 1 plus 2 equals 3. When we add those numbers together, we get a total of 3!

summary.title: Awesome Work Today!
summary.narration: You did fantastic today! We learned that 1 + 2 equals 3. Keep practicing addition, and soon you'll be a math star! See you next time!
